events.body: The following sections might be updated with supplementary metadata relevant to reviewers and maintainers. ### Reviews See [the guideline](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/blob/master/CONTRIBUTING.md#code-review) for information on the review process. | Type | Reviewers | | ---- | --------- | | ACK | [willcl-ark](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34560#pullrequestreview-3791414765) | | Stale ACK | [w0xlt](https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34560#pullrequestreview-3787276690) | If your review is incorrectly listed, please copy-paste <!--meta-tag:bot-skip--> into the comment that the bot should ignore.
As with https://github.com/bitcoin/bitcoin/pull/34268#pullrequestreview-3658078572, probably want to write this as backporting #34156, #34215, and #34226
